column4: hey, so i'm trying to install the gimp 2.7.5 on ubuntu 11.10, following these instructions: http://antonis.se/?p=140
i get the following result when i try to do that last command: http://dpaste.org/Nrnwx/
any idea what the problem might be? :\
PPA's are 3rd party repositories and not supported. It seems there is an dependency issue
